users.name: Sarah Chen
users.intro: Junior at UC Berkeley studying Design & CS. Built my first health app during a summer internship at a YC startup.
users.background: Started as the design lead for Berkeley's health tech club. Previously interned at a mental health startup where I redesigned their patient onboarding flow. Working on an app to help students find and book mental health resources on campus.

users.name: Marcus Rodriguez
users.intro: Senior at Georgia Tech in Computer Science. Been coding since high school, love building tools that make life easier.
users.background: Built a popular Chrome extension for students (10k+ users) that organizes Canvas assignments better. Did a summer internship at Microsoft. Now working on an AI study buddy that helps explain complex topics to students.

users.name: Alex Thompson
users.intro: Senior at NYU Stern, passionate about making investing accessible to college students.
users.background: President of NYU's Fintech Club. Won second place at Penn's fintech hackathon. Interned at Robinhood last summer. Building a platform that helps college students start investing with as little as $5.
